summary: This is a female armor replacer for Dawnguard DLC Ancient Falmer Armor AKA Ivory Armor. BBP.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Skimpy Ivory Armor BBP
Author: Edhildil
10,15,2013
ver1



[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

First of all, I made this armor the way I wanted to, to my specifications, Thats why it has my name in the title. 
It is MY mod. please respect that.

If it is to skimpy or not lore friendly, or not good enough for you, simply skip this mod. 

If you are going to leave a comment please be intelligent about it. 

If you are having trouble with this mod please leave enough details so I can understand what is going on. 

This is a female armor replacer for Dawnguard DLC Ancient Falmer Armor AKA Ivory Armor. (yes, Replacer)

I made this because I really do not like the vanilla female Ancient Falmer Armor (no offense Bethesda).
This also uses the vanilla texture which seems to me to be rather simple, but oh well.  

The lowerbody has been enhanced in the derrier region (buttock)
for a fuller, rounder profile. The waist is somewhat thinner.
The chest is not small or overly large.

Main file Based from CBBE. 

Optional file UNPB BPP version.

Optional 7base BBP version.
  
The armor is acquired off the corpse of one of the bosses towards the end of the Main Dawnguard Quest.

craftable version here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34550


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]

Dawnguard DLC

Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game. Or compatible textures.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling ( BBP animations)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888

XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800 

or a BBP skeleton such as included in CHSBC- BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod

I had the best results by manually installing these animations and skeletons, NMM freaks out alot.

 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location. 

copy/paste into Skyrim folder.


[img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/9233/uninstall.png[/img]

Delete the cuirassivory_0 and cuirassivory_1 .nif files in:  data/meshes/dlc01/armor/ivory/f folder.


[img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/9223/bugske.png[/img]

Some Long hairs will clip into the neckpiece of the armor. This is common with alot of armors, and it is not my doing.

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
CherryHotaling (BBP)
Edhildil (these new meshes)
Bethesda (original meshes)

Optional UNPB version UNPB with BBP body modified by Meister AKA neovinci
 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43083//)UNPB
  Original UNP body by dimon99 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709)

Optional 7base version Based from 7base body by Sevennity
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992/

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.  Enjoy!
author: Edhildil
